languages.text:
Будьте осторожны! Компаньоны могут пострадать от ваших {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}атак очередью{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g}.
Чтобы избежать {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}огня по своим{/g}, постарайтесь не размещать союзников в области потенциального поражения.
languages.original_text:
Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst shots{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid friendly fire, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the abilities' area of ​​​​effect.

traits.locale_text:
Будьте осторожны! Компаньоны могут пострадать от ваших выстрелов {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g}.
Чтобы избежать огня по своим, следите за траекторией выстрелов и областью применения способностей.

Будьте осторожны! Компаньоны могут пострадать от ваших выстрелов {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g}.
Чтобы избежать огня по своим, следите за траекторией выстрелов и областью применения способностей.

languages.text:
Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of area attacks and melee burst attacks.
languages.original_text:
Будьте осторожны! Компаньоны могут пострадать от ваших {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}атак очередью{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g}.
Чтобы избежать {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}огня по своим{/g}, постарайтесь не размещать союзников в области потенциального поражения.

traits.locale_text:
Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your burst shots or area attacks.
To avoid friendly fire, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the abilities' area of ​​​​effect.

Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of area attacks and melee burst attacks.

Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of area attacks and melee burst attacks.

Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of area attacks and melee burst attacks.

languages.text:
¡Ten cuidado! Tus ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfaga{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}de área{/g} pueden herir a tus compañeros.
Para evitar el {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}fuego amigo{/g}, fíjate en la trayectoria de los disparos y el área de {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de los ataques de área y de los ataques de ráfaga cuerpo a cuerpo.
languages.original_text:
Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of area attacks and melee burst attacks.

traits.locale_text:
¡Ten cuidado! Tus ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfaga{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} pueden herir a tus compañeros.
Para evitar el {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}fuego amigo{/g}, fíjate en la trayectoria de los disparos y el área de {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de los ataques de área y ataques de ráfaga de área.

languages.text:
気を付けろ！{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}バースト{/g}攻撃や{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}では、仲間を傷つけてしまうこともある。
{g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}同士討ち{/g}を避けるためには、攻撃の軌道と範囲攻撃や近接連射攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}範囲に注意しよう。
languages.original_text:
Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of area attacks and melee burst attacks.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}バースト{/g}ショットや{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}では、仲間を傷つけてしまうこともある。
{g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}同士討ち{/g}を避けるため、ショットの軌道と範囲攻撃や近接バースト攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}範囲に注意しよう。

languages.text:
要当心！当您使用{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}攻击或{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，您的同伴也同样可能会受到伤害。
为了避免{g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}误伤友军{/g}，请留意连发射击的弹道、范围攻击的影响{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}范围{/g}，以及近战连发攻击的攻击范围。
languages.original_text:
Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of area attacks and melee burst attacks.

traits.locale_text:
要当心！当您使用{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}攻击或{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，您的同伴也同样可能会受到伤害。
为了避免{g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}误伤友军{/g}，请留意连发射击的弹道、范围攻击的影响{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}范围{/g}，以及近战连发攻击的攻击范围。

languages.text:
Sei vorsichtig. Gefährten können durch deine {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Salven{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} verletzt werden.
Um {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}Eigenbeschuss{/g} zu vermeiden, behalte die Geschossbahn und den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} der Flächen- und Nahkampf-Salvenangriffe im Auge.
languages.original_text:
Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of area attacks and melee burst attacks.

traits.locale_text:
Sei vorsichtig! Gefährten können durch deine {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Schusssalven{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} verletzt werden.
Um {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}Eigenbeschuss{/g} zu vermeiden, behalte die Geschossbahn und den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Wirkungsbereich{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Flächenangriffsfähigkeiten{/g} im Auge.

languages.text:
Attention ! Vos compagnons peuvent être blessés par vos attaques en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}rafale{/g} ou vos {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}.
Pour éviter les {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}tirs alliés{/g}, surveillez la trajectoire des projectiles et la zone d'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} des attaques de zone et de mêlée en rafale.
languages.original_text:
Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of area attacks and melee burst attacks.

traits.locale_text:
Attention ! Vos compagnons peuvent être blessés par vos attaques en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}rafale{/g} ou vos {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}.
Pour éviter les {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}tirs alliés{/g}, surveillez la trajectoire des projectiles et la zone d'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} des attaques de zone et de mêlée en rafale.

Attention ! Vos compagnons peuvent être blessés par vos attaques en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}rafale{/g} ou vos {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}.
Pour éviter les {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}tirs alliés{/g}, surveillez la trajectoire des projectiles et la zone d'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} des attaques de zone et de mêlée en rafale.

languages.text:
Dikkatli ol! Yoldaşların, {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}seri saldırılarından{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırılarından{/g} dolayı yaralanabilir.
{g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}Dost ateşinden{/g} sakınmak için atışların mermi yolunu ve alan saldırıları ile seri yakın dövüş saldırılarının {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}etki{/g} alanını göz önünde bulundur.
languages.original_text:
Be careful! Companions can get hurt by your {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks or {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
To avoid {g|Encyclopedia:FriendlyFire}friendly fire{/g}, keep an eye on the trajectory of the shots and the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of area attacks and melee burst attacks.
